name: UF-0
description:
UF-0 is a small prototype developed for the Weekly Game Jam: Week 238 with GameMaker-Studio 1.4.

Control a UFO in his mission to find all the milk cartons spread around the world, avoiding spikes and solving puzzles too!

Controls:

  • UPKEY - Go upwards
  • RIGHTKEY/LEFTKEY - Move horizontally while in the air
  • Z (HOLD IT) - Pull nearby boxes
  • Z (RELEASE IT) - Drop box
  • ENTERKEY - Toggle fullscreen mode
  • R - Return to your nearest checkpoint
